# StartOfScan.StartingDctCoefficient property

The starting DCT coefficient. For a baseline sequential JPEG, this value is typically set to `0`, which means that the scan will start from the direct current (DC) coefficient.

```csharp
public byte StartingDctCoefficient { get; set; }
```
